body.name: Perfumed Fabric Conditioner (Fig Noir & Cedar), Premium vegan Fabric Softener, Highly Concentrated, 16.9 fl oz (500 ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Experience a Lasting, Deep Scent for 7 days with Niche Perfume. As an exceptional fabric softener with deodorizing properties, it eradicates unpleasant smells on clothes and ensures a long-lasting fragrance. Fragrance That Remains After Drying.

For the safety and reassurance of me and my family. We use premium plant-derived ingredients, causing no irritation to even the most sensitive skin. Our fabric softener contains USDA certified natural ingredients
Our product is 100% vegan certified by the Korea Vegan Certification Authority. We do not use animal-derived ingredients, or conduct any form animal testing.
Highly Concentrated, Use just 1/3 of the amount compared to regular fabric softeners.
Not only does our product provide fabric protection & softness, but it also delivers an excellent anti-static effect.
As part of our commitment to sustainable lifestyles, we use containers made from 100% recycled post-consumer plastic.
Environmentally friendly, achieving over 93% biodegradability, leaving no detergent residue.

productInformation.value: #206,039 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #130 in Liquid Fabric Softener

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SIGNATURE FRAGRANCES Fig Noir & Ceder - Experience the fragrance enriched with the aroma of figs, offering a delightful bittersweet scent, reminiscent of a beautiful, fruitful autumn day. - TOP : Fig MIDDLE : Fresh Rhubarb, Musty Green, Orange, Sweet Aldehydic BASE : Cedarwood

"No, it's not a perfume spray, I changed my fabric softener" In your quest for a unique fragrance, why use the same scent for fabric softeners? Now, you can switch your fabric softener to a 'Niche Fragrance'.

Experience a Lasting, Deep Scent for 7 days with Niche Perfume As an exceptional fabric softener with deodorizing properties, it eradicates unpleasant smells on clothes and ensures a long-lasting fragrance. 3x More Economical, 3x More Effective A little goes a long way. Use just 1/3 of the amount compared to regular fabric softeners. Use less, enjoy for longer. Not only does our product provide fabric protection & softness, but it also delivers an excellent anti-static effect. Our product softens stiff fabrics, reduces skin irritation due to static electricity, prevents the accumulation of fine dust, and minimizes the formation of fabric pills.

Softener without residual detergent LAVOIR fabric softener, achieving over 93% biodegradability, leaving no detergent residue. 'Korea Institute for Clothing Testing' Certification year/month : 2022.04.15 100% PCR Plastic As part of our commitment to sustainable lifestyles, we use containers made from 100% recycled post-consumer plastic. (PCR : Post-Consumer Recycled)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WONDERFUL VEGAN SOFTENER!! LAVOIR PremiumFabric Conditioner (Fig Noir&Cedar)
reviews.reviewText: LAVOIR Perfumed Fabric Conditioner (Fig Noir & Cedar), Premium vegan Fabric Softener, Highly Concentrated, 16.9 fl oz (500 ml)I love LAVOIR Perfumed Fabric Conditioner! The product is Vegan, and it is Cruelty-Free! The fragrance is really beautiful, though I can't begin to describe it. My clothes emerged nice and soft from the washer, which is important, since I don't have a dryer. I just love the fragrance of this fabric conditioner! Be sure to shake it really well before use.The product arrived in perfect condition, a 16.9 oz bottle (500 ml), with a small footprint, since it is very concentrated. The product is imported from Korea. The bottle is safety sealed also.It would be easier to use if the cap worked as a measure, which it does not. So, you'll need to find a measuring cup of some sort (maybe an old softener bottle cap) to measure 20-25 ml per load. You'll get 20-25 loads of softness, depending on the size of the laundry load.I really love the fragrance, softness, and the fact that this product is Vegan and Cruelty-Free. It's a little on the pricey side, but for the quality, it will be worth it to many of us. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Experience Easy and Fresh Laundry with Lavoir Fabric Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Using this fabric conditioner from Lavoir has made laundry day a breeze. The simple instructions - just shake the bottle and pour the desired amount into the washer - make it incredibly easy to use. As a Korean company, I appreciate the inclusion of English labeling on the bottle, even if it's just a sticker over the original Korean language.While the instructions could be more detailed regarding the amount to pour, I've found that using my own judgment works well. It would be convenient if a measurement cup were included, but eye-balling the amount hasn't been an issue for me.The fragrance of the fabric conditioner is delightful, and I've noticed that my clothes come out of the wash feeling soft and smelling fresh. Overall, despite some minor drawbacks in the instructions and packaging, the performance of this fabric conditioner has been impressive, making it a worthwhile addition to my laundry routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells and softens good
reviews.reviewText: There seems to be varieties of this conditioner, so I am writing for the “Fig Noir & Cedar” variety. I like that this conditioner has a different (in a good way) smell. I already love the smell of figs in everything else, so this is just right for me. It smells stronger right out of the bottle and less strong on clothes, but it is there. It does soften the laundry as well. The bottle comes sealed, which is a good first impression. The shape of the bottle is not ideal for pouring the conditioner out and you have to use your own measuring cup, but these are only minor things. The conditioner is a bit expensive, but it is used in small amounts and will last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Scent, But Could Be Stronger
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a nice fabric conditioner. It smells very strong when first opening the bottle, but using it at the recommended dose (1/3 of a regular conditioner) leaves the clothes with only a faint trace of scent.The scent is fantastic. We grow fig bushes/trees and this does have hints of fig, along with an forest smell background. It is like a perfect mix of feminine and masculine. Very nice. While it smells nice from the bottle, it does not stay very well on the clothes. I ended up using 2/3 of a regular fabric softener dose to get a decent amount of remaining scent. That makes this a rather pricey product.It does a decent job in making the clothing soft and static free. They are demonstrably fluffier after using this product, even at the recommended dosing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fruity Scent and Non-Allergenic
reviews.reviewText: I love the LAVOIR fabric softener or conditioner. It is non-allergenic and my skin loves it.I use the baby liquid detergent due to sensitive skin. I do need sometimes to use fabric conditioner to soften denim pants, minimize wrinkles on delicate clothes, and prevent the generation of static. This LAVOIR provides all those plus the benefit of being all-natural using plant-derived ingredients.The bottle is pretty cute with a matte color. The liquid conditioner is protected by a safety seal foil around the bottle’s mouth. The scent is fruity with a hint of fig and cedar, it has a pleasant smell and is non-irritating.Overall, I now switched to this brand, and will be the family fabric conditioner. Good stuff! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well; priced high.
reviews.reviewText: This smells wonderful! It has a very delicate, sophisticated, classy smell. It leaves my blankets feeling softer. 💕 The smell did disappear in the wash though, I’m guessing masked by the other products I use- detergents, etc. so I wish the smell did linger, bc it’s super nice. The price point is high, in my opinion, but for the quality of the product- it can be justified by many.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small good, it does works
reviews.reviewText: The scent of this fabric softener is particularly fragrant. I followed the instructions and added 20ml, and then the clothes all smelled very pleasant. Indeed, I feel that the towel has become softer, but it's not particularly noticeable. It's possible that the water quality here is still good and not particularly hard. I think it might help more noticeably in places where the water is harder. There's also noticeably less static electricity now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and lovely scent
reviews.reviewText: This softener made my bedding so soft and it smells so grown. I was confused about how much to use, but just did a conversion from 20 ML to TBSP (around 1.5) and used that amount with a large load and they came out great. I am fond of the smell, which has hints of wood and fruit, but seems more complex. I typically only use scent/softener on my outer bedding due to sensitive skin allergies/irritation, but accidentally washed my fitted sheet and haven't had any problems that I tend to have with the usual supermarket brands, so this is a nice surprise to me.

reviews.reviewTitle: めちゃくちゃいい香り
reviews.reviewText: フドブワ好きにはたまらない。

reviews.reviewTitle: 周りと被らない香りが好き
reviews.reviewText: 香りが長続きしてくれるし、香水ほどキツくないけどちゃんと香ってくれて、いい匂いだねって言ってもらえた！

reviews.reviewerName: Amazon カスタマーAmazon カスタマー
reviews.reviewTitle: 香りは最高、でも目盛りがない！
reviews.reviewText: 安っぽくない、ちゃんとイチジクの香り。使うたびにすごい癒し。 特にタオル類やクッションカバー、寝具のお洗濯の時に使うと、幸せが広がります！ しかも結構香りも本当に長持ちする！ 唯一の難点は、メモリキャップがない！😂 最近の洗濯機やドラム式とかなら、もしかしたら洗濯機自体に目盛りがあるかもだけどうちのはフツーの、シンプルで庶民的な洗濯機なのでまさかの目分量😂 お引越しとかのプレゼントにもぴったりなんだけどその際はメモリキャップも一緒にぜひプレゼントすることをお勧めしますw

reviews.reviewTitle: 優しい香りだけど印象に残る香り
reviews.reviewText: いちじくの香りを使いました。確かに香りはするんだけど、市販の柔軟剤の香りと比べ、鼻にツンとくるような香りではなく、マイルドな感じで、かつとても良い香りです。洗った物の柔らかさも普通にでると思います。キャップがとても小さく計量がしにくいのが少し気になったかな。少し手間だけど、市販の柔軟剤のカップを使って計量してます。全体的には満足です。
天然由来成分なので安心して使えます。少量で、イチジクの甘さとシダーウッドの深みのあるほろ苦さが優しく香ります。ボトルデザインも可愛くてお気に入り。
